Php 10,990.00

When it comes to speed and style, Sony Ericsson ARC S always is one of the comparison standard. with the slimmest point width of 8.7mm you simply cant imagine how great to have this phones in your hands, expectations beyonds it's size. 

 

Starting with 4.2" giant screen display for full web browsing, combining with a 1.4ghz snapdragon processor it makes your web browsing flawless great. Log on to facebook shoot your stunning moments with it's great 8mp camera and share it all the way in the social in split second.

read more
